document.title: Navigating and Browsing Code
document.paragraph:
Most of Visual Studio .NET language packages provide facilities to browse component references and code written in the language; EiffelEnvision is no exception. EiffelEnvision plugs directly into Visual Studio .NET's code browsing facilities and even extends the stock behavior to enhance code navigation. This section of the documentation provides the information on the extension and facilities exploited by EiffelEnvision.
in_this_section
2 In This Section
class_view/index.xml Class View
EiffelEnvision plugs into and extends the Class View in Visual Studio .NET to enhance the default code browsing facilities offered by Visual Studio .NET.
object_browser/index.xml Object Browser
EiffelEnvision also plugs into the Object Browser in Visual Studio .NET. EiffelEnvision brings with it the additions required to facilitate urlEiffel for .NET developers with the tools they may need.
eiffel_icons.xml Class View and Object Browser Icons
An icon glossary for the icons used in the EiffelEnvision specific sections of both the Class View and Object Browser.
